text: Mathew Knowles (born 1952)Knowles in is an American record executive, talent manager, and businessman. He is best known for being the manager of Destiny's Child. He also managed his daughters Beyonc√© and Solange Knowles. He is the ex-husband of Tina Knowles and father-in-law of Jay-Z. He was born in Gadsden, Alabama. In October 2019, Knowles announced that he is suffering from male breast cancer. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American record producers Category:Businesspeople from Alabama Category:People from Gadsden, Alabama
title: Mathew Knowles
